DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy adult male smoker age 18 50 year Body weight great 50kg BMI 18.529.9 kg/m2 . No abnormalities medical , psychiatric laboratory evaluation Smoke average 20 less 40 cigarette per day past year try give 3 month study . Exclusion criterion : History psychiatric disorder sleep disorder . Receiving treatment smoke cessation . Use tobacco product cigarette .
